revealed_to_reader: The Collector is an elegant Alpha woman in her 60s
She represents a consortium of Alpha collectors
Earth currency from 2089-2097 is especially valuable (last years before Collapse)
Specific denominations mentioned: $100 US bill from 2089, Euro from 2094, Yuan from 2097
The currency is worth 250+ million credits total
Jax bought a temporary pass to Level 3 for 50k from corrupt Beta administrator
Real coffee exists and is expensive
The Collector can smell Drift on people
Jax and Finn have never had real food before, always expired rations
Level 3 has real windows overlooking Saturn's rings

planted.element: Jax has no idea what wealth means
